analysis.description:
BulleonICO.refundMoney (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#289-293) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refundAmount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#290-293)

BulleonICO.withdrawFunds (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#320-322) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- WITHDRAW_WALLET.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#322)

Bulleon.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#330-331) shadows:
	- StandardToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#61)

Reentrancy in BulleonICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#211-242):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#216-217)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#222-223)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#235-236)
	- investments (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#228-230)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#235-236)

BulleonICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#211-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rewardToken.transfer(beneficiary,boughtTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#236-239)

Reentrancy in BulleonICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#211-242):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#216-217)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#222-223)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSold (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#228)

Reentrancy in BulleonICO.calcMultiStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#245-278):
	External calls:
	- undistributedTokens = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#277)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#274-275)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/3/0x7b1309c1522afd4e66c31e1e6d0ec1319e1eba5e.sol#277)
